attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that immigration is out of control and want the government to impliment a point system for immigrants wanting to settle in the UK - like that of Austrailia or New Zealand.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb. Please rephrase your title and resubmit your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
